Install PyFemtet

注釈

You will need administrator privileges to run this step.

Please download and run the script below.

pyfemtet-installer.ps1

To run the .ps1 file, right click and select 「run with powershell」.

警告

This script assumes that your Python installation includes py launcher.

Tip

If you are setting up pyfemtet in a virtual environment, change line 20 of the script to $python_command = 「python」 and run the script from the command line with your virtual environment active.

If this step fails, try the following steps manually:

  • Manually Install PyFemtet
  • Manually Enable Femtet Macro
  • Manually Set COM Constants
